text: Anage nehuno Ra Anumzamo'a mago'ane amanage huno nasmi'ne, Vahe'mofo mofavremoka, Nagra Jerusalemi kumapima me'nea ne'zana eri fanene hanenkeno, nezankura atupa nehu'za osi'a nezama mesiama'a sigerirera erinte'za refko huza osi'a netere nehu'za antahintahi hakare nehu'za, osi'a tima nesu'za tusi zamagogogu hugahaze.
